name: 2003 Pokemon EX Ruby & Sapphire 99 Lapras EX Holo PSA 7 NM (0x9e84...5b18)
description: RareMint Pokemon Genesis Mystery Pack (0x9e840b81f81c3aa672c0d3693b7f47cd7592d09e72dd93cb02d61ea831fa5b18) derived from the human readeable fingerprint of the physical item - which will be revealed at the same time as the NFT itself - using the Keccak256 cryptographic function. This unique identifier serves as a verifiable *Proof of Integrity* to certify that the corresponding physical asset is irrevocably associated to this NFT and vice-versa.
